org.jbiowh.core.dbms

Interface WHDBMSFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    WHMySQL

    public interface WHDBMSFactory
    This interface is to handled the DBMS connections $Author: r78v10a07@gmail.com $ $LastChangedDate: 2013-03-19 09:38:47 +0100 (Tue, 19 Mar 2013) $ $LastChangedRevision: 396 $
    Since:
    Jun 17, 2011

      • executeUpdate

        int executeUpdate(String sql)
                  throws SQLException
        Executes the given SQL statement, which may be an INSERT, UPDATE, or DELETE statement or an SQL statement that returns nothing, such as an SQL DDL statement.
        Parameters:
        sql - SQL sentence
        Returns:
        the number of the number of rows affected by a query
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • getLongColumnLabel

        long getLongColumnLabel(String sql,
                      String columnLabel)
        Get the integer columnLabel value returned by the SQL sentence
        Parameters:
        sql - The SQL sentence which return one Int columnLabel
        columnLabel - Column label which should be returned
        Returns:
        the int columnLabel

      • splitField

        void splitField(PrintWriter tofile,
              String sql,
              String field1header,
              String field2header,
              String separator)
        This metho split the field2header field returned on the sql sentence into a string array repeating the field1header
        Parameters:
        tofile - File to print the split result
        sql - SQL sentence with return two field
        field1header - Field name
        field2header - Field name
        separator - Separator of data into field2header

      • splitField

        void splitField(PrintWriter tofile,
              String sql,
              String field1header,
              String field2header,
              String separator1,
              String separator2)
        This metho split the field2header field returned on the sql sentence into a string array repeating the field1header. Each array element is split again into two fields using the separator2
        Parameters:
        tofile - File to print the split result
        sql - SQL sentence with return two field
        field1header - Field name
        field2header - Field name
        separator1 - Separator of data into field2header
        separator2 - Internal data separator into two fields

      • execute

        List<List> execute(String sqlQuery)
                   throws SQLException
        This method execute the SQL sentence. The first row is the columns names
        Parameters:
        sqlQuery - The SQL sentence
        Returns:
        A List Object with the result
        Throws:
        SQLException

      • executeSingleSQLSelect

        List<List> executeSingleSQLSelect(String sentence,
                                int offset,
                                int rowCount)
                                  throws SQLException
        Execute the SQL select sentence with the desired limits
        Parameters:
        sentence - the SQL select sentence
        offset - the offset of the first row to return
        rowCount - the number of rows returned
        Returns:
        a List object with the SQL result
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs, this method is called on a closed Statement, the method is called on a PreparedStatement or CallableStatement

      • executeMultipleSQLSelect

        List<List> executeMultipleSQLSelect(List<String> sentences)
                                    throws SQLException
        Execute multiples SQL select sentences
        Parameters:
        sentences - a list with the SQL sentences
        Returns:
        a List object with the SQL results
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs, this method is called on a closed Statement, the method is called on a PreparedStatement or CallableStatement

      • executeMultipleSQLSelect

        List<List> executeMultipleSQLSelect(List<String> sentences,
                                  int offset,
                                  int rowCount)
                                    throws SQLException
        Execute multiples SQL select sentences with the desired limits
        Parameters:
        sentences - a list with the SQL sentences
        offset - the offset of the first row to return
        rowCount - the number of rows returned
        Returns:
        Throws:
        SQLException - if a database access error occurs, this method is called on a closed Statement, the method is called on a PreparedStatement or CallableStatement

      • equals

        boolean equals(Object obj)
        Compares this WHDBMSFactory to the specified object.
        Overrides:
        equals in class Object
        Parameters:
        obj - The object to compare this WHDBMSFactory against
        Returns:
        true if the given object represents a WHDBMSFacotry equivalent to this WHDBMSFacotry, false otherwise
